description.message: Hide My IP VPN is number one tool for hiding your IP and unblocking any web site!

rate_message.message: If you enjoy using our tool, would you mind take a moment to rate it? Thanks for your support!

placeholder_enter_email.message: Enter your real or fake email

placeholder_message.message: Enter your message here. If you have problem with existing account, please include email, which was used during registration.

placeholder_raw_list.message: Enter each proxy server from new line in formats: A.B.C.D:PORT or USER:PASS@A.B.C.D:PORT

placeholder_site_explude.message: Enter here web sites you want to access without gateway. Each domain on a new line, for example facebook.com, youtube.com. Sites listed here will be accessed directly, without any privacy protection.

placeholder_search.message: type country or city name to search

label_select_gateway.message: Please select gateway to hide your location:

auth_incorrect_msg.message: Wrong password. Do you want to recover it?

auth_approve_msg.message: Account is not approved, please contact us.

auth_disabled_msg.message: Account is disabled, please contact us.

auth_wait_msg.message: Please wait 90 seconds before next login attempt.

auth_not_exist_msg.message: User does not exist, please register new account.

reg_cannot_msg.message: Cannot create new user, please contact us.

reg_exist_msg.message: User exist! Do you want to recover password?

list_not_have_msg.message: Your subscripiton expired, please extend it.

list_update_msg.message: If you complete payment, please update profile.

ticket_empty_msg.message: Subject and message cannot be empty

ticket_created_msg.message: New ticket created. We will be in touch shortly.

ticket_emailed_msg.message: Thank you for request. We will be in touch shortly.

ticket_subject_2_msg.message: I cannot log in to my account

ticket_subject_4_msg.message: I want report a bug in extension

recover_not_exist_msg.message: User does not exist, please register new account.

recover_emailed_msg.message: Your password has been e-mailed to you, check inbox.

default_features_1_msg.message: Both VPN and HTTPS proxy hides your country location and sites you visit

default_features_2_msg.message: Both VPN and HTTPS proxy gives access to geo restricted content and sites

additional_features_1_msg.message: VPN proxy encrypts information you send and recieve

additional_features_2_msg.message: HTTPS proxy offers 30% extra internet speed

how_to_type_1_msg.message: tip: select VPN proxy when you need to access bank, send or recieve private messages

how_to_type_2_msg.message: tip: select HTTPS proxy when you stream video, access social networks, browse sites

how_to_type_3_msg.message: *** you can always change proxy type from the button which is located in top left corner
